scripts.protoc: protoc --proto_path src --plugin=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=src/generated_DO_NOT_TOUCH --ts_proto_opt=esModuleInterop=true --ts_proto_opt=oneof=unions --ts_proto_opt=snakeToCamel=false --ts_proto_opt=unrecognizedEnum=false --ts_proto_opt=outputJsonMethods=false --ts_proto_opt=outputPartialMethods=false --experimental_allow_proto3_optional events.proto && echo export const protobufWriterLibrary = _m0 >> src/generated_DO_NOT_TOUCH/events.ts
